Articles.Content:
All the suddenly almost all my contracts are gone, not only the high profile test 24x4 and rapier in Mun orbit where the probe is underway was gone, very fun.

But also the default explore Duna, Ike and Eve missions however they came back at once.

Anybody else run into this? Run some mods: mechjeb, kethane, extraplanetary launchpad, alarm clock and a few part mods so can not submit bug report.

Well, beyond a bug report it's still useful to supply the same sorts of information. Simply saying you have a bug and that the contracts disappeared makes it difficult for us to help out.

If you could provide a screenshot, or simply more information like: What is your reputation at? What happened right before your contracts when away? What is shown in Mission Control? And maybe even a save file.

Cheers,

~Claw

Well, beyond a bug report it's still useful to supply the same sorts of information. Simply saying you have a bug and that the contracts disappeared makes it difficult for us to help out.

If you could provide a screenshot, or simply more information like: What is your reputation at? What happened right before your contracts when away? What is shown in Mission Control? And maybe even a save file.

~Claw

Not much information, I had build some ships with the extraplanetary launchpad had probably not checked the mision controll for a couple of days, not a long delay I'm still not reached other than Minmus but has a Eve and Duna / Ike probe underway.

I got a bunch of new contracts, usualy its only 2-3, I accepted then saw the Explore Duna, Ike and Eve and found it strange so I switched to active and saw it was as good as empty.

Reputation is topped, probably earned around 6 million so far but has spend most of it.
